amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for safety inspectors with the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration by $1,670,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds available for operational expenses for the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration by $1,670,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 265 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 265 (Roll no. 423).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
